Public Remarks: Calling all families. Award winning Hampstead by Portrait Homes is the best subdivision that Silver Valley has to offer. This beautiful neighborhood features a large center park, a looping, closed street where kids actually play and eco friendly designs that enhance the nature around you. The home itself is on an uphill lot so the flat backyard is right off the Kitchen/Greatroom. The outdoor spaces include a large covered patio off the front that looks at the Park and a covered rear patio. The backyard also backs onto a wide green space and is very private. Inside you'll find a better than new home with many upgrades including Central A/C, high ceilings, spacious rooms and beautiful finishing and a garage that is fully 27 feet wd.

Enjoy a panoramic view of North Shore mountains, Burrard Inlet, False Creek, city and parks. 2 bdrm 933 sq.ft. top of the line finishing home w/2 spa like bathrooms, solarium, office.
